paragraphs.original: 话说黛玉直到四更将阑，方渐渐的睡去，暂且无话。
paragraphs.english: Daiyu slept until four o'clock in the morning, slowly falling asleep, and saying nothing else.
paragraphs.chinese: 黛玉一直睡到四更天，才渐渐地睡着了，没有更多的话了。

paragraphs.english: Now, let's talk about the situation. The concubine, Feng Jie, hurriedly got dressed and rode a carriage to go to see the Xing family. Xing family asked the concubine to come because they had something difficult to do. The father-in-law wanted the concubine to take care of the old lady's room and wanted her to ask the old lady for it. The concubine thought it was a normal thing, but she was afraid the old lady wouldn't give it. What should the concubine do to deal with this matter? The concubine listened and laughed, "I think, don't touch this nail. The old lady can't eat without the quail. How can she give it up? And when she talks about idle words, the old lady often says: Why does the old man want to put another one in the room? First, it delays the girl's life, and second, it does not take care of his body, and he does not do his job well, and he drinks with the little wife every day. What do you think of the old man's love for the old man? Now it's better to avoid it. This is like poking the tiger's nose with a stickMy dear, I won't go. It's obvious that it's useless and will only lead to embarrassment. My father is getting old, and he may be a bit forgetful. You should persuade him instead. He didn't do anything wrong. Now that we have a large family, with brothers, nephews, sons, and grandchildren, it's not right to cause a scene. It's not appropriate for an old man like him to do these things. The fact that my husband has become an official and is now old and grey makes it even more inappropriate for him to do such things. It's not right for us to cause a scene like this.

All the big and small affairs in the family were controlled by Jia Pai. Everything entered and left the money was deducted by him. He used Jia Pai's waste as an excuse, and I had to be frugal in order to make up for it. No one in the family depended on him, and he didn't listen to a word. Now he has heard such words, he knows that he has again played his left character. He can't be persuaded anymore. He hurried to smile and said: "Madam, what you said is true. I have lived for so long. Do I know the weight and lightness? It is said that in front of parents, even if it is a baby, not given to the master, who is it given to? 将中国白话改写为简单的现代普通话的步骤如下：

1. 将“我先过去哄著老太太”改为“我先过去哄老太太”。
2. 将“等太太过去了”改为“等太太过去了”。
3. 将“我搭讪著走开”改为“我搭讪着走开”。
4. 将“把屋子里的人我也带开”改为“把屋里的人也带开”。
5. 将“太太好和老太太说”改为“太太好和老太太说”。
6. 将“给了，更好；不给，也没妨碍，众人也不能知道”改为“给了更好；不给也没妨碍，众人也不知道”。

经过以上步骤，就可以将中国白话改写为简单的现代普通话。

paragraphs.english: Xingfujun heard this and was pleased, and she told him, "I think first we shouldn't tell the old lady, because if she doesn't agree, that's the end of it. I thought: Let's first tell Qianyuan secretly; she might be bashful, but I can slowly persuade her. If she doesn't say anything, that's all right. Then we'll go to tell the old lady. Even if the old lady doesn't agree, Qianyuan will be willing. People will go where they want to go. If you don't want to go, you can't be forced to stay. So the matter is settled." Fengjie laughed, "You are very smart. This is a thousand-fold sure plan. No matter who, no matter what, who doesn't want to rise up and make a name for themselves? Why would she want to be a maid, and then get married to a man, when she could be a half-master?" Xingfujun laughed, "Just like that. Not only Qianyuan, but even those big maids, who don't want to be maids? You go and tell her nothing. I'll come over after I eat dinner."
paragraphs.chinese: 邢夫人听到他这么说，又高兴起来，然后告诉她道：“我的想法是，先不要告诉老太太，如果老太太不同意，那这件事就算完了。我心里想的是，先悄悄地告诉鸳鸯，－－她虽然害臊，我慢慢告诉她，如果她不说话，那就妥了。然后，再去跟老太太说。老太太即使不同意，鸳鸯也愿意。俗话说‘人去不中留’，自然这件事就解决了。”凤姐笑道：“您真有智慧。这是千妥万妥的主意。不管是谁，谁不想升官发财，谁不想出人头地？放着半个主子不做，倒愿意做丫鬟，将来找个小子，就完了呢！”邢夫人笑道：“正是这个意思。别说鸳鸯，就是那些执事的大丫头，谁不愿意这样呢？你先过去，别透露一点消息，我吃完晚饭就过来。

paragraphs.original: 邢夫人听了有理，便自往贾母处来。和贾母说了一回闲话儿，便出来，假托往王夫人屋里去。从后屋门出去，打鸳鸯的卧房门前过，只见鸳鸯正坐在那里做针线，见了邢夫人，站起来。邢夫人笑道：“做什么呢？”一面说，一面便过来接他手内的针线道：“我看看你扎的花儿。”看了一看，又道：“越发好了。”遂放下针线，又浑身打量。只见他穿著半新的藕色绫袄，青缎掐牙坎肩儿，下面水绿裙子；蜂腰削背，鸭蛋脸，乌油头发，高高的鼻子，两边腮上微微的几点雀瘢。
paragraphs.english: Xing Fu heard that there was reason to it, so she went to see Jia Mi. After talking with her for a while, she left from the back door and passed by the door of Jia Ying's room. She saw Jia Ying sitting there doing embroidery. Xing Fu asked what she was doing and took the needle and thread from her hand. "It's very good," she said. After putting down the needle and thread, Xing Fu looked at Jia Ying's clothes. She was wearing a half-new aubergine silk blouse, a green satin collar jacket, and a water green skirt. Jia Ying was slim and beautiful, with black hair that shone like oil, a high nose, and some freckles on her cheeks.
